SELECT MS_USER_ID, KEY, VALUE,
DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_USER_ID, RENEW_DATE, TS
FROM MS_USER_SETTINGS
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND MS_USER_ID = :MS_USER_ID
ORDER BY KEY

INSERT INTO MS_USER_SETTINGS( MS_USER_ID , KEY , VALUE ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_USER_ID , :KEY, :VALUE ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_USER_SETTINGS SET VALUE = :VALUE, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID, TS = :TS
WHERE MS_USER_ID = :MS_USER_ID AND KEY = :KEY AND TS = :TS
